prompt: Photorealistic image capturing an antique appraisal scene, landscape format (16:9). A richly detailed, ornate antique German beer stein (Mettlach style, stoneware with intricate pewter lid) sits prominently on the left side of a heavy, dark wood antique desk. On the right, the focused hands of an elderly appraiser wearing tweed hold a vintage magnifying glass over the stein's base, examining the maker's mark. Scattered nearby are appraisal tools: a small brass ruler, an open reference book with illustrations, and a notepad. Soft, directional window light illuminates the scene from the left, highlighting textures. The background shows a blurred study with bookshelves. Professional, academic aesthetic, shallow depth of field focusing on the stein and hands. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: value-of-old-german-beer-steins-image-1.png

prompt: Professional museum-style photograph of a collection showcase, landscape format (16:9). A long, polished dark oak shelf stretches horizontally across the frame. Displayed upon it are six distinct antique German beer steins, evenly spaced, showcasing variety in size, material (stoneware, porcelain, glass), decoration (relief, painted), and lid type (pewter flat lid, ornate figural lid). The most elaborate stein is positioned slightly off-center. Overhead spotlights cast soft, defined shadows beneath each stein, emphasizing their forms and textures against a simple, dark grey textured plaster wall background. Clean, high-end gallery aesthetic, photorealistic detail. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: value-of-old-german-beer-steins-image-2.png

prompt: Extreme close-up macro photograph focusing on the intricate details of a valuable antique German beer stein, landscape format (16:9). The frame is dominated by the textured surface of a 19th-century stoneware stein. Sharp focus is on a specific area on the left side: a highly detailed, hand-painted figural scene depicting hunters. To the right, slightly softer focus reveals the intricate pewter thumblift mechanism attached to the lid hinge. The background is heavily blurred (bokeh). Lighting is bright and focused, highlighting the craftsmanship, paint texture, and slight imperfections of age. High-detail, photorealistic, shallow depth of field. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: value-of-old-german-beer-steins-image-3.png

prompt: Atmospheric photorealistic scene set in a dimly lit, rustic 19th-century German tavern corner, landscape format (16:9). Three different antique German beer steins (one tall stoneware, one shorter porcelain, one glass with pewter lid) rest on a worn, heavy wooden table in the foreground. One stein is slightly angled, showing its interior. Faint light from an unseen window catches the condensation on one stein. The background features dark wood paneling, rough ceiling beams, and a hint of a stone hearth, creating historical context. Lighting is moody and warm, reminiscent of gaslight or candlelight, with deep shadows. Painterly quality, rich textures, historical ambiance. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: value-of-old-german-beer-steins-image-4.png

prompt: High-contrast studio photograph comparing antique German beer steins of varying value, landscape format (16:9). On the left third of the frame, dramatically lit from above, sits a single, exceptionally ornate and pristine Mettlach Villeroy & Boch stein on a small, dark velvet pedestal, clearly presented as highly valuable. On the right two-thirds, positioned slightly behind and under softer, more diffuse lighting, are three simpler, more common antique steins (basic blue/grey stoneware, one lidless) sitting directly on the dark, reflective surface. The background is a smooth, dark gradient fading to black. Photorealistic, professional studio shot emphasizing the contrast in quality and implied value. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: value-of-old-german-beer-steins-image-5.png
